tasks.label: Run Executable (Release)
tasks.command: exec_name=$(awk ' /^[ \t]*set\(/ { match($0, /^[ \t]*set\s*\(\s*([^ \t)]+)\s+([^ \t)]+)\s*\)/, m); if (m[1] && m[2]) vars[m[1]]=m[2] } /^[ \t]*project\(/ { match($0, /project\(([^\)]+)\)/, p); proj=p[1]; if (proj ~ /^\$\{[^}]+\}$/) { varname=proj; gsub(/^\$\{|\}$/, "", varname); print vars[varname] } else { print proj }; exit }' CMakeLists.txt); ./build/$exec_name

tasks.label: Run Executable (Debug)
tasks.command: exec_name=$(awk ' /^[ \t]*set\(/ { match($0, /^[ \t]*set\s*\(\s*([^ \t)]+)\s+([^ \t)]+)\s*\)/, m); if (m[1] && m[2]) vars[m[1]]=m[2] } /^[ \t]*project\(/ { match($0, /project\(([^\)]+)\)/, p); proj=p[1]; if (proj ~ /^\$\{[^}]+\}$/) { varname=proj; gsub(/^\$\{|\}$/, "", varname); print vars[varname] } else { print proj }; exit }' CMakeLists.txt); ./debug-build/$exec_name

tasks.label: Run Tests
tasks.command: latest_dir=$( [ ! -d build ] && echo Debug || ([ ! -d Debug ] && echo build || (stat -c '%Y' build > /tmp/build_time && stat -c '%Y' Debug > /tmp/debug_time && if [ $(cat /tmp/build_time) -gt $(cat /tmp/debug_time) ]; then echo build; else echo Debug; fi) ) ); GTEST_COLOR=1 ctest --test-dir $latest_dir --output-on-failure -V
